verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:6
verses.text: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe, one of the Levites, wrote them before the king, and the princes, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and before the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites: one principal household being taken for Eleazar, and one taken for Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:7
verses.text: Now the first lot came forth to Jehoiarib, the second to Jedaiah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:8
verses.text: The third to Harim, the fourth to Seorim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:9
verses.text: The fifth to Malchijah, the sixth to Mijamin,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:10
verses.text: The seventh to Hakkoz, the eighth to Abijah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:11
verses.text: The ninth to Jeshua, the tenth to Shecaniah,
